MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 12.38pm in the LL77 postcode area of Llangefni following reports of road traffic accident involving our powerline near Pen Parc. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely possible by 2.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.40pm on April 1, 2021.
